page.title: 08MY WEEKEND.
page.content: On Friday when I get home from school I play out until 9.30p.m. then I watch "Fear on Friday." In the morning I go shopping with my Mam and when we come back me and my Dad go and play squash at the Sports Centre.I also play football with my brother at the Grange field Community Centre. On Sundays,I have to take my Dad his dinner to work at Jackson's Bakery on Yarm Road near Preston Park. My Mam and Dad go out nearly every Saturday night. On Sunday afternoon I play on my BMX at Riggy's Field near Yarm Road.
